dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Michael Hoerman
172 Middle St Apt 304
Lowell, MA 01852
978-455-3858 mhoerman@gmail.com

April 18, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: (650) 618-2680

Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
Pages: 2

To Whom It May Concern:

Thank you for responding to my earlier DMCA complaint [#134327415] and deleting posts at pornfield.blogspot.com in accordance with DMCA.

I AM WRITING TO REQUEST FURTHER ENFORCEMENT OF TOS.

Five posts at pornfield.blogspot.com are copied verbatim from my deleted blog. Administrators of the blog claim copyright over my work, with a 2007 copyright date listed at the URL, implying my active authorship and consent for my works to appear. I do not consent or authorize the use of my works by the current administrator of the blog at pornfield.blogspot.com.

1. COPYRIGHTED WORK THAT HAS BEEN INFRINGED UPON.

From 12/8/2004 to 3/21/05 I operated "Michael Hoerman's Pornfield" at pornfield.blogspot.com. I posted copyrighted material there including poems for which I am the sole copyright holder. While the blog was under my operation posts appeared at the following permalinks:

a. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2004/12/fig.html
b. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2004/12/sound-artist-ellen-band-creates-range.html
c. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/01/woodsman-and-nixie-we-saw-naked-woman.html
d. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/03/its-official-current-mass.html
e. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/03/2005-visual-poetry-exhibition-infinity.html

Please note: I deleted all posts at this blog shortly after March 2005, including those above. The content of posts now appearing at these permalinks is copied and posted verbatim from my original blog without consent or authorization.

2. MATERIAL THAT IS INFRINGING UPON THE COPYRIGHTED WORK LISTED ABOVE.

The following active permalinks point to current posts consisted of verbatim copies of posts made by me at pornfield.blogspot.com prior to 2005, when I deleted the blog in its entirety.

a. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2004/12/fig.html
b. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2004/12/sound-artist-ellen-band-creates-range.html
c. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/01/woodsman-and-nixie-we-saw-naked-woman.html
d. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/03/its-official-current-mass.html
e. http://pornfield.blogspot.com/2005/03/2005-visual-poetry-exhibition-infinity.html


3. MY EMAIL ADDRESS IS MHOERMAN@GMAIL.COM.

4. I HAVE A GOOD FAITH BELIEF THAT USE OF THE COPYRIGHTED MATERIALS DESCRIBED ABOVE ON THE ALLEGEDLY INFRINGING WEB PAGES IS NOT AUTHORIZED BY THE COPYRIGHT OWNER, ITS AGENT, OR THE LAW.

5. I SWEAR, UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY, THAT THE INFORMATION IN THE NOTIFICATION IS ACCURATE AND THAT I AM THE COPYRIGHT OWNER OR AM AUTHORIZED TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE OWNER OF AN EXCLUSIVE RIGHT THAT IS ALLEGEDLY INFRINGED.

5. THIS LETTER IS SENT VIA FAX ON APRIL 18, 2007 TO BLOGGER LEGAL SUPPORT AT FAX 650-618-2680.

Sincerely,
Michael Hoerman
